General.Name: T4F Entretenimento S.A
General.Description: T4F Entretenimento S.A. operates as a live entertainment company in South America. The company offers a range of artistic and cultural content. It also promotes and sells tickets for shows and events, such as live music events; produces family events, and theater; operates venue; operates in ticketing industry under the Tickets for Fun and Ticketek brands; sells food, beverage, and merchandise; and offers corporate sponsorship services comprising event promotions. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Cristiano Viana, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 05411- 000
